DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine how different types of breast implants contour to the chest wall.
DOC.brief_title: Upright Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) Study - Breast Implant Shell Geometry and Edge Scalloping
DOC.criteria: had previous primary breast augmentation had previous replacement of breast implants has Baker Class I breast implant capsule has scar capsule contracture around the breast implants of Baker Class IIIV is pregnant or may be pregnant has possibility or previous history of metallic foreign body
